byline.contributor: Emily Palmer, Marc Santora and Tatiana Schlossberg contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

abstract: Angel Quinones, William Lamboy and Eddie Torres are shot in drug-related attack outside McDonald's restaurant on Eighth Avenue near Pennsylvania Station in Manhattan; Quinones dies in shooting; block and restaurant remain pocket of grit recalling area's rougher days.
lead_paragraph: The early morning altercation started inside a McDonald’s on Eighth Avenue, between 34th and 35th Streets, that has a reputation as a throwback to a seedier era in New York.

headline.main: In a Corner of New York City That Goes ‘Back Into the 70s,’ Gunman Kills One and Wounds Two
headline.print_headline: Gunman Kills One and Wounds Two Near Penn Station

snippet: The early morning altercation started inside a McDonald’s on Eighth Avenue, between 34th and 35th Streets, that has a reputation as a throwback to a seedier era in New York.
